sourcesContent:
import style from '../views/style.css' import axios from 'axios' import { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const LandingPage = (props) => { const [currCat, setCurrCat] = useState(""); const [catMeals, setCatMeals] = useState([]); const [ready, setReady] = useState(false); const currentCat = (value) => { axios.get(`https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1/filter.php?c=${value}`) .then(res=> { setCurrCat(value) setCatMeals(res.data.meals) setReady(true); console.log(currCat) }) .catch(err=>console.error(err)) } return (

CHOOSE BY CATEGORY

{props.categories.map((cat, i)=> {currentCat(cat.strCategory)}}>{cat.strCategory.toUpperCase()} )}

OR

LET US PICK A MEAL FOR YOU!



{props.currCat.toUpperCase()}

{ready && catMeals ? catMeals.map((rec, i) => { return
{currMeal(rec.idMeal)}}> {rec.strMeal.toUpperCase()}
}) : <> }
) } export default LandingPage;
